sense.def:
Kar je
technically true or possible
, je res ali možno glede na dejstva, zakone ali pravila, ni pa nujno pomembno ali bistveno v konkretnih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: He was technically in breach of contract.
The electric car is technically feasible.

sense.def:
Izraz
technically
se nanaša na praktične spretnosti ali postopke v umetnosti, obrti ali pri športu.

seg.quote: Pollock was certainly a skilful artist technically.
